title: Can't join game [Wrong password or username?]
body:
So I was trying to play a game of league with some friends and it would not let me log back into my client saying I got the wrong username or password. So then I repaired using hextech tool and it still does not work.. I can login to the  league of legends website on my web browser just fine using the same credentials. Does anyone know what is wrong?

Edit: I have also tried to reset my password and I still could not login.

replies.body: I made a post on this issue a few days ago and I was told to look at their help page.
I am having this exact same issue too ! ! ! ! !

We currently have a [sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)about this up, but the issue seems to stem from being on the wrong patch.  Instead of running a repair, I suggest doing a Force Repatch instead to make sure you get to the most recent version.  I also recommend a manual adjustment to help prevent this mismatch again:

Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml within C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open it with a text editor (such as Notepad, TextEdit, or Notepad++) and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
Save the file.
Restart the client.

Hope it helps!

I am having this exact same issue. I tried loading into a game and it crashed then after trying a few times without closing the client it still wouldn't work. I then closed the client and now it says wrong password or username and I use the same credentials on the site and I am able to log in.

Same for me I was in the loading screen of a game. then it crashed so I had to open league again and then it said that they changed the version of my game so they had to update and then when I tried to login it said wrong username or password even thought I used the same one ive been using since 2012... So right now I'm just troubleshooting my client...
